amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the VA from constructing new structures to be used as childcare centers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 116-6 to prohibit the VA from constructing new structures to be used as childcare centers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bergman amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 246 (Roll no. 72).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Bergman amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 246 (Roll no. 72).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Bergman.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
